snippet: Mr. Hays, who once worked as a Bible salesman, arranged last year to leave his and his wife’s more than 600 masterwork paintings to France....

headline.main: Investors Bet Trump-Fueled Tech Rally Far From Over
headline.print_headline: Investors Bet Trump-Fueled Tech Rally Far From Over

lead_paragraph: Mr. Hays, who once worked as a Bible salesman, arranged last year to leave his and his wife’s more than 600 masterwork paintings to France.
